name: OUTDOOR RECREATION ROUNDTABLE ASSOCIATION
description: Coalition of outdoor recreation trade associations.
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to public lands and outdoor recreation.
Issues related to climate change and 30x30.
Issues related to public lands, equity, and conservation including implementation of the Great American Outdoors Act (P.L. 116-152), 30x30, recreation policy, and rural development.
Issues related to public lands, equity, and conservation including implementation of the Great American Outdoors Act (P.L. 116-152), 30x30, recreation policy, and rural development including the SOAR
Issues related to the INVEST in America Act (H.R. 3684) including the Recreational Trails Program.
